isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - MAJOR STRUCTURAL REPAIR: 9600 - FASTENERS AND SEALERS - SEALER

svcproc.title: SEALER
svcproc.para: It is just as important to carefully seal all riveted joints as it is to use the right fasteners. Good sealing results in a weatherproof unit that will stay that way even under rough service.

Use a one part, urethane sealer to join all riveted surfaces. Recommended sealer is Chem-Calk 900 or equivalent. Do not use tape type sealer or a silicone base sealer. When entire panels are being replaced, clean both surfaces and apply a 3/16-1/4 inch bead of sealer to one surface on center line of rivet holes. If repairs include work on the drip rail at the roof line, you must apply sealer to the upper surface as illustrated in Figure 9.
